## IProtectionManager.IsEncrypted property

Gets a value indicating whether this instance is encrypted. Read-only Boolean.

```csharp
public bool IsEncrypted { get; }
```

### Property Value

`true` if presentation was loaded from encrypted file or [`Encrypt`](../encrypt) method was called ; otherwise, `false`.
